alert.note: Alert for Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 4:23PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Henry, Clay, western Randolph and Quitman Counties through 600 PM EDT/500 PM CDT/... At 523 PM EDT/423 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lakepoint Resort State Park to 8 miles southeast of Georgetown to near Fort Gaines. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Gaines, Cuthbert, Georgetown, Bellville, Bluffton, Walter F. George Lock And Dam, Wire Bridge, Walter F George Lake, Standleys Store, Watson Crossroads, Crossroads, Pecan, Randolph Co A/p, Hatcher, Morris, Jones Crossing, Bethel, Suttons Corner, Springvale and Cotton Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
